dmca.title: [ABUSE] ANTI PIRACY ALERT!! "GLASHAUS"]
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, May 06, 2005 1:34 PM
To: server@logistepag.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] ANTI PIRACY ALERT!! "GLASHAUS"]

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

-------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] ANTI PIRACY ALERT!! "GLASHAUS"
Date:         Fri, 6 May 2005 16:40:53 +0200
From:         LOGISTEP AG <server@logistepag.com>
Organization:         LOGISTEP AG
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>
CC:         'ceo' <ceo@logistepag.com>




Ladies and Gentlemen,

unfortunately we had to determine it Internets entrance to spreading of
illegal one copy from music "GLASSHOUSE" protected by Copyright in P2P
eDonkey are used.
  Ask for deletion and caution of your Clients.
In the plant they find the Screenshots.
IP 195.245.244.243

Yours sincerely

Leszek Oginski

Ceo / Gesch
